Features.title: Description
Features.text: Teamote is a webapp that will mimic a real classroom during remote learning.

Features.title: Features
Features.text: Provides real time analysis of the studentsâ€™ expressions and reports the average emotion back to the teacher.

Features.title: Purpose
Features.text: To provide an accurate representation of understanding and attention for the teacher.

Features.title: Team
Features.text: Built for Hack The 6ix, made by Ansel, Keyon, Kyrel, Nareshri.
